definition: to get married soon after meeting

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Tracy's sudden marriage knocked my socks off.
sentences.chinese: 特雷西的閃電結婚讓我感到震驚。

sentences.english: Did not think of two people bear long already amour to erupt immediately, instantly lightning marriage.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到兩人隱忍已久的戀情頓時爆發，立即閃電結婚。

sentences.english: You look like you might get married extraordinarily as well.
sentences.chinese: 看起來你可能閃電結婚。

sentences.english: Tracy"s sudden marriage knock my sock off ."
sentences.chinese: 特雷西的閃電結婚使我感到震驚。
